entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over eastern sections. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
